nodes.text: A hideout was operated by the Opposition on the moon of the Inner Rim planet Pijal. Around 40 BBY, the performance troupe's leader Halin Azucca and her associates met with the Jedi Qui-Gon Jinn and Obi-Wan Kenobi in the hideout to discuss the blackguard attacks of Czerka Corporation facilities that had been blamed on the Opposition.
The Opposition hideout first appeared in Master & Apprentice, a 2019 novel written by Claudia Gray.
